definition: to have water get in (one's ear, shoes etc)/to get flooded/inflow of water
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to have lost one's mind/crazy/soft in the head

sentences.english: " You this bag is very special, fell into the water and no water wet".
sentences.chinese: “你这个包还真是很特别，掉进水里也没进水湿掉”。

sentences.english: " You this bag is very special, fell into the water and no water wet".
sentences.chinese: “你这个包还真是很特别，掉进水里也没进水湿掉”。

sentences.english: EVERY evening the young Fisherman went out upon the sea, and threw his nets into the water.
sentences.chinese: 每晚，年轻的渔夫都要出海打鱼，将他的网撒进水里。

sentences.english: Install a shutoff valve in the cold water inlet.
sentences.chinese: 在冷水进水管上安装一个关断阀。

sentences.english: She could fly because of the intake of the pills.
sentences.chinese: 由于药片的进水闸，她可能飞行。

sentences.english: If your wife and your mother fall into the water at the same time, who will you save first?
sentences.chinese: 假如你媳妇和你妈同时掉进水里，你先救谁？

sentences.english: Effect of influent composition on membrane fouling in membrane bioreactors was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膜生物反应器中进水组成对膜污染的影响。

sentences.english: The box fell into the water and sank like a stone.
sentences.chinese: 箱子掉进水里，很快就沉了下去。

sentences.english: From before, two actors had made plan to throw the director into the water.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，两个演员就计画好要把导演丢进水里。

sentences.english: The force of Bear's weight threw her into the water.
sentences.chinese: 母熊用力过大，掉进水里。

sentences.english: How did you fall in, Eeyore?
Even if two of these were flooded, she would stil be able to float.
sentences.chinese: 即使有两个舱进水，它依旧可以浮在水上。

sentences.english: The water intake is internally mounted.
sentences.chinese: 进水口是安装在里面的。

sentences.english: After stopping dewatering, the intake electromagnetic valve is closed in delayed time.
sentences.chinese: 在停止放水后，延时关闭进水电磁阀。

sentences.english: The simulation elements of the vehicle will be destroyed on impact with the water.
sentences.chinese: 这些运载工具上的模拟元件如果进水将会被毁灭。

sentences.english: Not dry completely, if the sources of the inlet of water are kept open.
sentences.chinese: 不把进水口堵住的话，池塘中的水永远也不会干涸。

definition: Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to flow backwards (of water, because of flood, tide, wind etc)/reverse flow/to back up (sewage)
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
